summary: AppV1.jsx was heavily modified and includes local-only state with persistence to the required localStorage key. However, the change set also modifies non-requested meta/documentation files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json). hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added repository meta summary content describing features and file purposes (not requested by the BuildRequest).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only requests overwriting frontend/src/AppV1.jsx while preserving entry wiring (no changes to App.tsx/immutable entry files) and staying frontend-only; it does not request updating summary/metadata files.
